sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-button v-b-toggle.collapse-2 variant="success m-2">建立網址</b-button>
    <b-collapse id="collapse-2" class="m-2">
        <b-card>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">連結名稱</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <b-form-input v-model="linkName" placeholder="請填入連結名稱"></b-form-input>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">連結分類</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <b-form-input v-model="linkType" placeholder="請填入連結分類"></b-form-input>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">填寫網址</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <b-form-input v-model="url" placeholder="請填寫網址"></b-form-input>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
            <b-row class="my-2 text-center">
                <b-col md="12">
                    <b-button variant="primary m-2" 
                        @click="completeURL">
                        建立完成
                    </b-button>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
        </b-card>
    </b-collapse>
    <b-button v-b-toggle.collapse-file variant="success m-2">建立檔案</b-button>
    <b-collapse id="collapse-file" class="m-2">
        <b-card>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">連結名稱</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <b-form-input v-model="linkName" placeholder="請填入連結名稱"></b-form-input>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">連結分類</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <b-form-input v-model="linkType" placeholder="請填入連結分類"></b-form-input>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">填寫網址</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <form id="form" ref="form" class="" @submit.prevent="handleSubmit">
                    <input type="file" @change="handleImageSelected">
                    <b-button variant="success m-2" 
                        type="submit">
                        確認檔案
                    </b-button>
                    </form>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
            <b-row class="my-2 text-center">
                <b-col md="12">
                    <b-button variant="primary m-2" 
                        @click="completeFile">
                        建立完成
                    </b-button>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
        </b-card>
    </b-collapse>
</template>

<script>
// import axios from 'axios';
import { useImageUpload } from './useImageUpload';
import { LinkServer, FileLinkServer } from '../../providers/http-server';
import { ref } from "vue";
export default {
    name: "Home",
    setup() {
        var images = ref([]);
        var linkName = ref("");
        var linkType = ref("");
        var url = ref("");
        
        var { imageFile, imageUrl, handleImageSelected } = useImageUpload();

        function handleSubmit() {
            var formData = new FormData();
            formData.append("file", imageFile.value);
            var request = new XMLHttpRequest();
            request.open("POST", "http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/file/create");
            request.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem('API_TOKEN'));
            request.send(formData);
            request.onreadystatechange = function () {
                if (request.readyState === 4) {
                    if (request.status === 200 && request.statusText === 'OK') {
                        FileLinkServer.create({
                            file_id: JSON.parse(request.response).data.id,
                            type_id: 6,
                            sheet_id: 0
                        }).then(() => {
                            localStorage.setItem('FILE_ID', JSON.parse(request.response).data.id);
                        });
                        // console.log(JSON.parse(request.response))
                    } else {
                        // console.log('failed');
                    }
                }
            }
            
        }
        return {
            handleImageSelected,
            imageUrl,
            handleSubmit,
            images,
            linkName,
            linkType,
            url,
        };
    },
    methods: {
        completeFile() {
            LinkServer.create({
                url: localStorage.getItem('FILE_ID'),
                name: this.linkName,
                type: this.linkType,
                download: 1
            }).then((response) => {
                FileLinkServer.update(localStorage.getItem('FILE_ID'), {
                    sheet_id: response.data.id
                }).then(() => {
                    // console.log(res);
                    localStorage.removeItem("FILE_ID");
                });
            });
            this.$router.go(0);
        },
        completeURL() {
            LinkServer.create({
                url: this.url,
                name: this.linkName,
                type: this.linkType,
                download: 0
            }).then(() => {
                // console.log(response);
            });
        }
    }
};
</script>
